Jessup begins his scans of the Yorktown
15.content:
The Ta’rek are an advanced but secretive race. They had very strong nonintervention policies that included mandatory cloaks around all other species. They also cloaked their entire star system from view of others. The activities of humanity had become of increasing interest to them. The Ta’rek directorate has commissioned a mission to collect a sample of humanity’s most advanced vessels to analyze how much of a threat they were.

Humans were one twelfth the size of the Ta’rek, so all that was needed was a simple cargo vessel to capture their sample. This ship, the Crest, was manned by a small family that has one daughter.

They had spotted the Yorktown out of normal patrols a few days back and followed it to Erde. The Ta’rek had a special affinity to Erde and it’s near microscopic people, and didn’t really care for how humans sometimes defiled their world. However, seeing that the Yorktown was providing humanitarian aid following a catastrophic tsunami warmed their hearts. Father still decided to collect the Yorktown, as it would not be noticed by other military craft, but wait until they were finished rendering aid.

Their daughter, Sarea, was practicing on the scopes as the Yorktown’s mission neared completion. She saw the entrance of a very small human craft. “Daddy, look, there is another Earth ship.”

Her father saw this and pounded the console. Their presence could spoil weeks of work. Weeks that they could not afford as they would only be paid for the capture, not the waiting.

“What’s wrong, Daddy?”

“We will have to find another ship, the little one will tell Earth of our taking the Yorktown.”

“Could we take that ship too?” Sarea asked.

“Of course not, we are permitted to take just one ship. That isn’t even a military vessel.”

“But Daddy, I would love to have it. It says there is a boy and a girl inside. You promised me something for my birthday.”

“Sarea, these are people, not toys.” The father felt a soft, warm hand on his shoulder. His wife’s smile always melted his heart.

“Jessup, give Sarea the ship. Think of it, we can study it too and have a picture of their civilian tech as well as their military tech.”

Jessup melted, “Alright. Targeting beams engaged. The small craft is safely in Sarea’s room and we have computer control of it.”

Emily noticed alerts on her display, “It appears the Yorktown noticed us taking the shuttle.”

Jessup smiled, “Ok, force fields up in the cargo hold and tractor beam engaged.” After just a minute the vessel was dragged inside and Jessup reported, “The Yorktown is nicely stowed.”

“Daddy it appears they are firing their weapons at us.”

“It’s ok baby, they can’t harm us. It does not appear I will gain computer control, but I can disable their weapons.” Jessup pressed a series of commands and the firing stopped. “There we go.”

Emily remarked, “I see that at least twenty humans are still on Erde. We can’t leave them there. They would hurt the Erdians.”

“Good point dear, please teleport them into a sample container. You’ll need to separate them from their tech too so they don’t start anything funny.”

“Yes dear.” Emily teleported the humans into a nearby tub. “I’ll take them to the galley for processing.”

Emily kissed Jessup as she hefted the sample container and walked from the bridge. Jessup also noticed Sarea skip off the bridge, clearly to play with her new toys. He set in a course for Ta’rek and engaged faster than light drive.
15.title: Another Alien Race

151.content:
Sam and Rachel were caught off guard when the beautiful view of Erde was replaced by large bulkheads. It appeared as if they were in a spaceport, but there were no other ships present. Their console read as if it was in spaceport mode. Sam attempted to override spaceport mode and was unable to.

The two heard the clunk of landing struts being extended and watched as their ship lowered onto a platform. There were odd structures on the platform, including what appeared to be giant advertisement sized sodas and magazines, but they were brands that were unfamiliar and written in a language that they could not comprehend.

Sam felt Rachel clutch his arm when the truly unexpected came into view - smiling at them through their front screen was a giant teenage girl with red hair and green eyes. She pushed her hair behind her ear and then tapped on the transparent aluminum screen as if they were fish in a tank.

—-

Sarea skipped down the corridor as she made her way to her bunk. She was really glad to still be with her parents. Most 18 year olds on Ta’rek would have had to enter into civilian or military service for a three year tour. There were exceptions for children of long haul freighter families as these children serve vital roles on ship’s crews and would ultimately themselves become the owners of their own freighters eventually. It wasn’t that haulers were a second class of citizens, but they were a rather close knit group with a culture unto themselves. Further, after a time haulers involved themselves little with the affairs of Ta’rek.

Over her 18 years, she had learned to stealthily operate her hatch. When everyone was asleep, she loved to sneak down to the engine compartment and feel the hum of the quantum drive in her core as she stared out at the expanse. She loved to do this even more when they were in orbit of worlds, particularly Earth and Erde. She wondered what the tiny people of these worlds were like - the idea of owning a few of them is blowing her mind.

As she silently closed the hatch, she immediately fell in love with the small shuttle hanging in front of her over her desk. It was about the size of a toy, approximately 1 meter long and half meter wide. She pulled out her personal tablet and directed the craft to extend landing struts and land on her desk. She had full control of the little vehicle.

As she directed the little shuttle to download its databanks into the ship’s computer, she couldn’t help herself. Leaning over the craft, Sarea was thrilled it had an actual window into the cockpit. It appears that she had both a man and a woman human and they were so adorable! She tapped the window to get their attention. It was so perfect that the tiny woman clutched onto the man. She was so pretty and she couldn’t wait to wrap her hands around her body.

Through a few button presses, she activated the speakers inside the ship and patched them through to microphones outside. She quietly spoke to her new pets, “My name is Sarea. I am so glad you get to live with me now.” Sam and Rachel heard this but it was in a language they could not understand. When their response was piped back to Sarea, she quickly realized her mistake.

The look of realization on her face - her lips drawn into a little “o” shape, her eyes in surprise, and a large blue finger tip raised - looked adorable. Sam couldn’t help feeling a bit attracted to the sexy giantess before him. His penis twitched in confusion. Whatever attraction he felt was met equality with mortal fear. This creature, at least 35 feet tall, could easily smash them without thinking. Somehow she captured them easily. He turned to Rachel, “Honey, I am not sure what we should do, I think we need to go with the flow for a little bit.”

Hugging him for comfort, she rubbed his chest. From the tent forming on his pants, she could tell he was getting aroused. That raised her ire, “Is this situation making you hard? Do you think she is hot?”

Sam stammered, “This is confusing, honey. You were also just playing with me a few minutes ago - so I am feeling a bit blue balled too.”

Rachel pushed back, “Do you think this giant teenager is hot?”

Sam sighed, “Honey, look at her, don’t you think she is beautiful too?”

Rachel placed her hand over Sam’s face and shoved back, “As much as I would hate to agree, she is. You need to promise me you will think with your head and not your dick.”

Sam smirked at Rachel, “I love you, Rachel. I think you are just pissed that this girl had the same idea as you and got what she wanted first.”

“What?” Rachel asked indignant.

Sam rolled his eyes, “You wanted to come to Erde in order to collect a few people to keep. You never thought you would be the toy sized person who was kept by another, right?”

Rachel chuckled, “I guess so. We have become the Erdians.”

Just then the ships speakers again crackled to life, “Humans, can you understand me now?” Both nodded. “Excellent, I forgot to upload your language matrix into our translator. You humans have such a diverse suite of languages, so thank you for talking as it allowed me to lock onto your specific language quickly.”

Sam stammered, “You heard what we said?”

Sarea nodded, “I’m flattered you both think I am pretty. You two are absolutely perfect to me too. I can’t wait to get to know you so much better. You two are some of the first humans the Ta’rek have ever collected, so you should feel honored. I am especially blest because you are my humans. The rest of your people are going to be studied by the Ta’rek Scientific Directorate. No doubt they will be distributed throughout the Ta’rek worlds to be studied by the brightest.”

Sarea saw the look of worry on her dolls’ faces, “Don’t worry pretty ones. You will be safe with me. I want us to all be happy. You will be able to live happy full lives in comfort. I’ll also take care of any children you have as well. I just met you, but I love you both very much....am I rambling?”

Rachel leaned forward, “What other people did you collect?”

Sarea smiled, “Oh, we collected your battleship that was orbiting Erde. I think it is called ‘Yorktown.’ My family was commissioned to collect a sample of human military technology. My people are afraid that your people will become a threat to us. Your very ingenious creatures and your technology is advancing very quickly.” Sarea stroked the shuttle. “You also are very aggressive beings. That is something that scares the Ta’rek. We are also afraid you will harm other beings in the universe, like the Erdians. The Ta’rek are very fond of the Erdians. Who knew intelligent beings could exist at nearly microscopic scale?”

Both Sam and Rachel sat back, they hadn’t really thought about the scale of things in the universe. It never dawned on them that humans could be on the smaller end of that scale.

“Enough talking, please come out here. I would like to take a much closer look at you.” They watched as Sarea’s blue finger-nailed fingers worked quickly on her tablet. They heard the rear hatch unlock, depressurize and open. Rachel took Sam’s hand into hers and they looked intently at one another, not sure of their next action.
151.title: Sarea plays with her new toys

1513.content:
Sarea tapped on the desk, “Ok my sweeties, please come out. I want to get a much closer look at you!”

Sam and Rachel looked at each other and came to the same conclusion. “No Sarea, we won’t be coming out. Please release our craft and let us on our way. We have waited a long time for this vacation. You don’t own us.” Sam stated matter of factly.

Sarea smiled, “Silly doll. You come out here.”

“No.”

The two watched her ball her fist and smashed her fist onto the shuttle. Klaxons activated for micro fractures that her massive fist caused. The two clasped onto one another. “Please stop Sarea!” Rachel cried.

“Aww you have such a cute voice pretty little one. Please come out!”

“Please let us go!”

The two saw a five fingers as large as legs enter the shuttle’s hatch. The blue fingernails made the the scene even more odd. Sam grabbed a sharp piece of metal that broke free when Sarea hit the craft.

Through the window, they could see beautiful red hair obscuring Sarea’s face, her sticking her tongue out of her red lips. As a blue tipped index finger approached Sam, he stabbed the metal shard into her finger. This elicited a monstrous wail and the arm withdrew.

The hatch of the shuttle closed and a new alarm appeared on the screen. Sam and Rachel grabbed at their throats as the air began burning their lungs.

“You little shits, I have just changed your atmosphere to one toxic to you. If you apologize, I may let you live.”

As their vision turned dark, Rachel muttered, “Please let us live....”

The two humans collapsed onto the deck.
1513.title: After Not Leaving, Sarea closes the hatch and r...

15132.content:
Through the transparent aluminum shell, Sarea watched her dolls collapse and start twitching. She turned her attention to her finger. After a few minutes, she finally coaxed out the metal shard which Sam had embedded. She stuck her finger in her mouth to sooth it.

Turning her attention back to the craft, she expected her dolls to apologize for mistreating her. They said they were looking forward to their vacation. They should be thanking her for giving them an infinite vacation. They however were no longer twitching. They had pinkish foam in their mouths.

“Oh no, I may have waited too long....” Sarea commanded the craft to open its door and vent the toxic atmosphere.

Once this was done, she reached in and pulled out Rachel. She flopped about in Sarea’s hand like a rag doll. It was immediately clear to Sarea that she was dead. Sarea began to cry at the loss of this tiny thing.

She didn’t get to mourn long as a circle of heat appeared on the ceiling of her cabin. Sarea looked on in apt curiosity as a metal plug was pulled away. A massive pointed finger entered the cabin and smashed the human shuttle into nothingness with just a fingertip. It didn’t even seem this hand slowed down when it made contact.

The hand then opened like a claw and before Sarea could react, she found herself entangled in the fingers. She screamed as she was lifted from her cabin. She closed her eyes and clung to the fingers.

When she opened her eyes again, she was face to face with the smiling face of a young girl. She had long brown hair that extended to her waist. Half of her hair was tied up. She had sweet blue eyes, rosy cheeks and red lips.

Without any thought, the girl straightened Sarea in her hand and brought her face to her lips. She gave her a massive kiss, her face being brought slightly into her mouth. Pulling her back, she finally spoke “The Ta’rek are so adorable. You are even more pretty than most! I think I am going to call you Kait.”

“But my name is Sarea, not Kait!”

The girl giggled, “Dollie, you are my toy, so I get to name you. Plus, I get to dress you too. I don’t like this jumpsuit on you. Yuck.”

Sarea’s blue tipped fingers clawed at the giant girls fingers, but this did not stop the girl from finding the zipper on Sarea’s jumpsuit. As she plucked at it, the zipper broke. This also did not deter the girl and she tore the jumpsuit from Sarea’s body.

Poking Sarea’s full breasts, she giggled again “Your pink bra and underwear are cute. You get to keep them girlie. But I want to look at you!”

Gently, the giantess used her fingernail to pull down the front of her panties. Bringing her nose close, the giantess sniffed her new toy’s bush and vulva. “I’ll have a lot of fun playing with this more later. I love your red bush! However, I have to do my chores.” With a very tongue filled kiss, she licked the salt from Sarea’s belly before shoving the redhead deep into a cargo pocket.

With a pat of the pocket, she got up from her desk and went about her day.

Over time Sarea adjusted to her new life and even learned to look forward to the attention this new friend of hers gave. Although she never liked being clawed at during nervous games of pocket pool. That didn’t stop her from wondering what might have been if she let Sam and Rachel live.
15132.title: Sarea allows Sam and Rachel to Die

info.brief_description: Human spacecraft finds world of tinies and stop over at an amusement park for fun.
info.description:
In the far future, humans travel the stars through a system of interspace relays. At times this results in the crew having a stopover until the relays are realigned. On such stopover systems contains the world of Erde.

Erde is exactly like Earth, but at one twenty fourth scale (people are about six inches tall). The world is also developmentally like the early 2000s. The Erdians know about humanity about the tricks they play. The Erdians can do little to stop the humans. Earth transit authority has requested that people donât interact with Erde, but this isnât monitored or enforced. Additionally, Erdians taken as pets are not confiscated.

You are either of a couple who are dating who ventured through space on a vacation. You are on a 24 hour stop over in Erdian space. An amusement park on your scanners has caught your attention.
